subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Buoyed by running back Arian Foster and a defense that didn’t allow a touchdown, Houston beat Cincinnati in an A.F.C. wild-card game to earn a meeting with the Patriots.
snippet: Buoyed by running back Arian Foster and a defense that didn’t allow a touchdown, Houston beat Cincinnati in an A.F.C. wild-card game to earn a meeting with the Patriots.
